services.name: King for a Day Package (For Him)
services.description: Every king deserves royal treatment! Our exclusive men's Valentine's package with deep cleansing facial, massage, grooming, body scrub, and champagne.
services.fullDescription:
Treat the special man in your life (or yourself!) to the ultimate grooming and relaxation experience.

This comprehensive package includes:
• Deep Cleansing "Gentleman's Facial" with steam, extractions if needed, and purifying mask
• Relaxing scalp, neck, and shoulder massage
• Brow & nose/ear cleanup (quick wax or trim)
• Hydrating hand treatment (paraffin or mask + massage)
• Aromatherapy body scrub with shower
• Champagne and chocolate

Total treatment time: 1.5 hours

**Just for Valentine's Day**

**Promotion Details:**
• Valid: February 1-16, 2026
• Special Valentine's Day Hours: Saturday, February 14 - Open!
• Book online or call (718) 841-9919
• Advance booking recommended
benefits: Deep cleansing gentleman's facial with steam & mask

services.name: Hydra Facial — Valentine's Special
services.description: Get glowing for your Valentine's plans! Advanced vortex technology deeply cleanses, exfoliates, and hydrates for instantly radiant skin.
services.fullDescription:
Look picture-perfect for all your Valentine's celebrations!

Our signature Hydra Facial uses advanced vortex technology to:
• Deeply cleanse and remove impurities
• Exfoliate dead skin cells
• Extract debris from pores
• Hydrate with nourishing serums
• Infuse antioxidants for protection

Results:
• Instantly radiant, glowing skin
• Plump, hydrated complexion
• Smoother texture
• Reduced fine lines
• Even skin tone
• No downtime

Perfect timing:
• Book 2-3 days before Valentine's Day for maximum glow
• Ideal for date nights and special events
• Safe for all skin types

**Promotion Details:**
• Valid: February 1-16, 2026
• Special Valentine's Day Hours: Saturday, February 14 - Open!
• Book online or call (718) 841-9919

services.name: Lash Lift and Tint — Valentine's Special
services.description: Wake up with gorgeous, fluttery lashes! Natural lifting and darkening for perfectly framed eyes that last 6-8 weeks.
services.fullDescription:
The ideal enhancement for romantic date nights!

Our Lash Lift and Tint service includes:
• Professional lash lifting for natural curl
• Dark tinting for definition
• No extensions needed
• Low maintenance beauty
• Long-lasting results (6-8 weeks)

Perfect for:
• Valentine's Day date nights

• Anyone tired of mascara
• Natural lash enhancement

What to expect:
• Treatment takes 45-60 minutes
• Relaxing, comfortable process
• Immediate, dramatic results
• Wake up looking polished
• Waterproof & smudge-proof

**Timing tip:**
Book at least 1 week before Valentine's Day for best results!

**Promotion Details:**

services.name: Be My Valentine Customized Gift Card
services.description: Give the gift of choice! Beautifully presented Valentine's gift cards with personalized messages, available in any amount.
services.fullDescription:
Not sure which package to choose? Give the perfect gift with our special Valentine's presentation gift cards!

**What's Included:**
• Beautifully presented in romantic Valentine's packaging
• Include your personalized love note or message
• Available in any denomination
• Never expire
• Can be applied to any service or product
• Elegant presentation perfect for gifting

**Special Bonus Offer:**
Purchase a $200+ gift card and receive a complimentary $25 bonus card for yourself or to share!

**Perfect for:**
• Romantic gifts for your partner
• Treating friends to spa days
• Last-minute Valentine's gifts
• When you're not sure what to choose
• Adding to other Valentine's gifts

**How it works:**
1. Choose your amount (any denomination)
2. Add your personalized message
3. Pick up or we can mail it
4. Recipient books their preferred services
5. Gift card never expires!

**Purchase Options:**
• Buy online
• Call (718) 841-9919
• Visit us in person at 97-12 66th Ave, Rego Park

**Promotion Details:**
• Available: February 1-16, 2026
• Beautiful Valentine's packaging included
• Can be used for any service year-round
